name: Baby Pegasus in the Rainbow Unicorn Twilight Kingdom
name_original: Baby Pegasus in the Rainbow Unicorn Twilight Kingdom
description:
Charge!! Jump, spin and fly with Little Unicorn across 5 enchanting Fairy Kingdoms, collect all the magic gems along the way and help your Princess to become the Unicorn Queen.

Get ready for a magical adventure set across 25 beautiful Castle and Fairy Garden Levels. Leap from spinning wheels to reach gems and money bags, speed your journey and hop aboard princess carriages and blast from golden trumpets to reach your journeys end.

So shake out those wings, don some horsey shoes and swish that tail, fun and magical adventure awaits! Gain all 10 Achievements for your Princess to be crowned Queen.

Enchanting Features

- 25 Magical levels through 5 Fairy Garden Realms
- Collect Gems, find Princess Carriages and Golden Trumpets
- Connect to Game Center Leaderboards
- Gain all 10 Achievements and become Unicorn Queen
- Share with friends on Facebook
- Endless Story for those who just wanna fly, fly, fly away!
